title: Let's increase the value of the Rari!
body:
To avoid token price drop, we should ONLY distribute the Rari token to those who buy or sell using Rari.
An alternative is to create an important Airdorp exclusively to HODLers.
This way we would give more reasons to hodl the Rari token.
And this should increase Rari price.
choices: Distribute the Rari token ONLY to those who buy or sell with Rari
Create an important Airdorp exclusively to HODLers.
author: 0xAdD18B6C8a77cB7a119bfB2d70a29B89bB8ba1A5
